cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on June 7, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: Estimated Pay-As-You-Go Effects of H.R. 3648, the Equal Access to Green Cards for Legal Employment Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 95 (Tuesday, June 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. LOFGREN:
H.R. 3648.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 4 provides Congress with the
power to establish a ``uniform rule of Naturalization.''
[Page H2685]

latestAction.text: POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - Pursuant to clause 1(c) of rule XIX, further proceedings on H.R. 3648 were postponed.

title: EAGLE Act of 2022
